snippet.title: Sprinkle video game launch trailer - iPhone Android
snippet.description:
http://www.gamezplay.org - Titan is burning and its inhabitants need your help to put out the fires! One brave little Titan, Ouie, has built a giant water cannon to combat a storm of fiery asteroids sweeping the landscape. 

But Ouie needs your help to raise the cannon, take aim, and save his people with your mighty stream! In Sprinkle, an inventive puzzle game from Swedish mobile games developer Mediocre, players will find incredible water physics and mind-tingling puzzles to solve as they try to save the huts and villages of Titan from flaming destruction. Sprinkle is available now for $0.99 on iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. An extended version of the game, featuring 24 extra levels, is also available on Tegra-powered Android devices for $1.99.
